alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Onondaga County through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Syracuse, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, De Witt, Solvay, Manlius, Fayetteville, Minoa, East Syracuse, Lyndon and Watervale. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 35. New York Interstate 81 between 16A and 22, and near 23, 24A and B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
